column4: Okay, so once I go 64-bit, I may have some issues with codecs.  Alright.  Flash and Java are difficult but not impossible.  Better performance with 64-bit, I assume?  And can I still play Urban Terror?  :)
Oh, and how's WINE?  Will WINE complain (whine?) under 64-bit?
i doubt if you will find any noticeable preformance improvement  with 64bit.
